transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji good evening Mukammil ji baat kar rahe hain Nikal and Sons se?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji haan sir main Naveen baat kar raha tha senior manager IndiaMART se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan sir actually sir recently abhi aapka interaction hua Riya se Riya meri team mein kaam karti hain and kuch discussion hua jispe aapne ek not satisfied ka feedback diya hai just a minute.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Yes I hope aap hi ne diya sir?
Customer: By mistake ho gaya hoga sir.
Executive: Thoda main main busy tha to shayad by mistake ho gaya jaan bujh ke nahi kiya.
Customer: By mistake hua hai sir.
Executive: Ji ji ji shayad.
Executive: Okay okay I think IndiaMART aap hi handle karte hain aur mobile app bhi aap hi rakhte hain right?
Customer: Ji ji ji main dekhta hu mobile hua mushkil hoga kyuki mujhe.
Executive: Sir ye click aap hi se hua hai na sir?
Customer: Hua to mere phone se lekin wo by mistake hua hua sir. Main actually whatsapp pe wo account bana raha tha to shayad wo uske andar hua tha. Kyuki main whatsapp jo hai na baar baar block ho raha hai matlab jaise IndiaMART se koi mai lead uthata hu to main whatsapp block ho jata hai block ho jata hai.
Executive: Aap jab waha se share karte honge uske baad wo block ho raha hai right?
Customer: Yes yes yes. Aaj aur aaj first time aa gaya fifth time aa gaya ho gaya.
Executive: Sir waise main ek suggestion deta hu kyuki dekhiye whatsapp kab block hota hai sir? Whatsapp block hone ke kai multiple reason hote hain. Jaise main bhi agar apna experience share karu sir to dekhiye IndiaMART se iska koi relation nahi hai kyuki aap kya karte hain lead manager se aap waha pe share on whatsapp pe click karte hain apni detail bhejne ke liye jab wo detail whatsapp pe client ke paas jaada jati hai to us samay wo block ho jati hogi uske baad. Right? Aisa hi ho raha hoga.
Customer: Jaise wo pahuchte hain matlab wo jo hai na wo dekhte bhi nahi hai tab tak tab tak whatsapp disable ho chuka hota hai.
Executive: Hmm correct. Dekhiye sir whatsapp kya hai meta whatsapp ko chalata hai sir. Theek hai? To kai baar aisa hota hai sir ki multiple messages jaane ki wajah se bhi meta kya hai kai logo ko block kar deta hai sir. Multiple message jaane ki wajah se bhi. Waha pe aap dekhenge na whatsapp pe ek feature aata hai jaha pe aap apna issue report kar sakte hain. Whatsapp open kariyega.
Executive: Theek hai waha pe report issue karke ek option aata hai waha pe ye daaliyega ki aapka jo whatsapp hai ye block ho raha hai aur uska reason jo hoga wo unse puchiyega to meta jo hoga uska reason bhi aapko share karega wo.
Customer: Theek hai sir wo to 24 ghante ka time hai jaise hi open hota hai to main issue bhi dalta hu waha pe.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul usko kariyega sir. Actually IndiaMART ki taraf se koi issue nahi hai sir kyuki aap na lead manager se usko share on whatsapp pe click kar rahe honge sir.
Customer: Yes yes yes.
Executive: Haan to wo whatsapp pehle se karte hain na to char panch saal se IndiaMART chalate hain.
Customer: Bante hi hain. Lekin abhi mere sath ho raha hai bhaiyon ke sath to nahi ho raha abhi bhi. Matlab aapke number se bhi uthata hai wo bhi consume kar rahe hain lead ko lekin mere sath hi kyu ho raha hai ye thoda sa hai.
Executive: Ye jo business whatsapp hai ye wo aapke number se login hoga right?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Haan to ye bhi ho sakta hai sir aapka number jo hai usse ye bulk messaging ja rahi ho aur exact reason jo hoga wo meta hi bata payega sir ek aap mail share kariyega ya to report issue mein jaakar waha pe aap apna issue report kar dijiyega to whatsapp se waha pe feedback bhi aapko aayega ki wo block kyu ho raha hai uska reason bhi wo denge sir.
Customer: Theek hai main karta hu isko.
Executive: Theek hai Mukammil sir waise mera number aapke paas save bhi hoga nahi hai to isko Naveen ke naam se aap save kar lijiyega. Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Riya haan Riya meri team mein hi kaam karti hain sir aur wo aapka account handle karti hain koi bhi issue kabhi bhi kisi cheez se related hota hai to directly aap unse baat kar liya kariye aur ek baar sir jaise Riya ne aapko bola bhi hoga ye jo issue aa raha hai sir aap uska ek video bana ke bhi bhejenge to hum bhi try karenge sir ek baar connect karke samajhne ka.
Customer: Actually bahut try kar raha hu main subah subah by lead consume ki jab bhi try kiya fir bhi nahi bana. Dopahar mein bhi tab bhi nahi bana. Achha ab maine socha ki nahi hoga chalo ab maine kiya to fir wo ho gaya wapas se. Jab se tab nahi hua tha sir. Abhi teesre din mein sham by lead uthai thi wapas se ho gaya.
Executive: Wo main keh raha hu sir ek baar try kariyega mujhe jaha tak lag raha hai sir ye ye meta ki taraf se hi hai meta ke end se block ho raha hai aapka whatsapp uska reason jo hoga wo meta aapko detail mein batayega but aap tab bhi aap ek video mujhe bana kar bhej dijiyega ya Riya ko bhej dijiyega to mere end se agar kuch finding niklegi to main aapko bhi share karunga sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir thank you. Theek hai to abhi ke liye ye feedback main close kar raha hu sir kyuki aapne bataya ye aapne galti se click kar diya tha aapke paas.
Customer: By mistake hua.
Executive: Haan sir wo feedback aaya tha mere paas to abhi main close kar raha hu to aapke paas dobara sir ek feedback jayega.
Customer: Aayega to main de dunga.
Executive: Haan apna mail check kariyega sir mail pe hi jayega to it's my request ki aap uske feedback jarur dijiyega apna.
Customer: Theek hai sir de dunga. Theek hai thank you thank you.
Executive: Bye.
Customer: Bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's WhatsApp is getting blocked repeatedly.

- Customer gave a 'not satisfied' feedback by mistake.



Resolution:

- Executive explained possible reasons for WhatsApp block.

- Executive suggested reporting the issue to WhatsApp.

- Executive will try to resolve issue if video is shared.

- Executive closed the 'not satisfied' feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will report issue to WhatsApp.

- Customer will share video of the issue.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp, block, feedback, lead, meta
